query:
UPDATE cve_scans
        SET
            status = $1,
            completed_at = NOW(),
            total_packages = $2,
            total_vulnerabilities = $3,
            critical_count = $4,
            high_count = $5,
            medium_count = $6,
            low_count = $7,
            scan_duration_ms = $8
        WHERE id = $9
